Random (and mostly irrelevant) stat of the day:
the Packers rank dead last in defensive epa per play allowed on 2nd down. I made that table because I have been told the Chargers were so bad on third down (that's kinda true).
Data: #nflverse https://t.co/pD4XxsrM80

Playoff is coming..... Eagles Vs Buccaneers.

Two completely different offense. Bucs has the higher pass ratio - Eagles the lower pass ratio. Here the breakdown during the game. Bucs never went below 50%.
